languages.text: {n}Фелек громко выдыхает и слегка улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Я... Не знаю, как и сказать. Никогда не признавался в подобном — не позволял ни статус, ни честь. Однако вы пробудили во мне надежду. Надежду покинуть эту станцию вместе с госпожой. А потому я посмею просить вас о последней услуге".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фелек громко выдыхает и слегка улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Я... Не знаю, как и сказать. Никогда не признавался в подобном — не позволял ни статус, ни честь. Однако вы пробудили во мне надежду. Надежду покинуть эту станцию вместе с госпожой. А потому я посмею просить вас о последней услуге".

languages.text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."
languages.original_text: {n}Фелек громко выдыхает и слегка улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Я... Не знаю, как и сказать. Никогда не признавался в подобном — не позволял ни статус, ни честь. Однако вы пробудили во мне надежду. Надежду покинуть эту станцию вместе с госпожой. А потому я посмею просить вас о последней услуге".

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek sighs loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... Do not even know what to say. Never before did I admit it for my status and honour would both suffer, but you gave me hope. The hope to leave this station together with mistress. Which is why I am asking you for one last favour."

{n}Felek sighs loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... Do not even know what to say. Never before did I admit it for my status and honour would both suffer, but you gave me hope. The hope to leave this station together with mistress. Which is why I am asking you for one last favour."

{n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Never before could I admit it due to my status and honour, but you awoke hope in me. Hope to leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am asking you one last favour."

{n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Never before could I admit it due to my status and honour, but you awoke hope in me. Hope to leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am asking you one last favour."

Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

{n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

languages.text: {n}Felek atmet laut aus und lächelt.{/n} "Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich ... ich weiß gar nicht, was ich sagen soll. Status und Ehre hielten mich bisher davon ab, es zuzugeben, aber Ihr habt Hoffnung in mir geweckt. Die Hoffnung, diese Station tatsächlich gemeinsam mit der Herrin verlassen zu können. Und daher bitte ich Euch nun um einen letzten Gefallen."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek atmet laut aus und lächelt.{/n} "Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich ... ich weiß gar nicht, was ich sagen soll. Ob meines Status und meiner Ehre konnte ich es noch nie zuvor zugeben, doch Ihr habt Hoffnung in mir geweckt. Die Hoffnung, diese Station gemeinsam mit der Herrin verlassen zu können. Und daher bitte ich Euch um einen letzten Gefallen."

languages.text: {n}Felek souffle bruyamment et dit avec un sourire :{/n} « Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je... je ne trouve même pas les mots. Mon statut et mon honneur m'interdisaient jusque-là de l'admettre, mais vous m'avez donné de l'espoir. Celui de quitter cette station avec ma maîtresse. Voilà pourquoi je dois vous demander un dernier service. »
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek souffle bruyamment et dit avec un sourire :{/n} « Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je... je ne trouve même pas les mots. Mon statut et mon honneur m'interdisaient jusque-là de l'admettre, mais vous m'avez donné de l'espoir. Celui de quitter cette station avec ma maîtresse. Voilà pourquoi je dois vous demander un dernier service. »

languages.text: {n}费雷克大声呼着气，随后露出了笑容。{/n}“谢谢您，行商浪人。我……我都不知道该说什么好了。虽然碍于身份和面子，我之前从未承认过，但您唤醒了我的希望。现在我真的认为，说不定我真的可以与女主人一起离开这里。所以，我希望您能帮我最后一个忙。”
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}费雷克大声呼着气，随后露出了笑容。{/n}“谢谢您，行商浪人。我……我都不知道该说什么好了。虽然碍于身份和面子，我从未承认过，但您唤醒了我的希望。现在我真的认为，说不定我真的可以与女主人一起离开这里。所以，我希望您能帮我最后一个忙。”

languages.text: {n}フェレックは、大きく息を吐いて微笑んだ。{/n}「感謝するよ、自由開拓者殿。その…何と言えばいいだろう。私の立場と面目もあって、今までそれを認めることができなかったが、あなたは私の中に希望を呼び覚ましてくれた。主と共にこのステーションを出るという希望だ。そこで、最後に頼みがある…」
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}フェレックは、大きく息を吐いて微笑んだ。{/n}「感謝するよ、ローグトレーダー殿。その…何と言えばいいだろう。我が立場と名声もあって、今までそれを認めることができなかったが、 あなたは希望を呼び覚ましてくれた。主と共にこのステーションを出るという希望だ。そこで、最後に頼みがある…」
{n}フェレックは、大きく息を吐いて微笑んだ。{/n}「感謝するよ、自由開拓者殿。その…何と言えばいいだろう。私の立場と面目もあって、今までそれを認めることができなかったが、あなたは私の中に希望を呼び覚ましてくれた。主と共にこのステーションを出るという希望だ。そこで、最後に頼みがある…」

languages.text: {n}Felek exhala profundamente y sonríe.{/n} «Gracias, Comerciante Independiente. Yo... No sé qué decir. Mi estatus y mi honor me impedían admitirlo hasta ahora, pero me ha dado esperanzas. Esperanzas de dejar esta estación junto a mi señora. Por eso le ruego este último favor».
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek exhala profundamente y sonríe.{/n} «Gracias, Comerciante Independiente. Yo... No sé qué decir. Mi estatus y mi honor me impedían admitirlo, pero me ha dado esperanzas. Esperanzas de dejar esta estación junto a mi señora. Por eso le ruego este último favor».

languages.text: {n}Felek, derin bir nefes verip gülümsüyor.{/n} "Sağ ol Hür Tacir. İnan... Ne diyeceğimi bilemiyorum. Hem makamım gereği hem de kendime yediremediğimden söylemedim ama bana umut verdin. Bu istasyondan hanımımla birlikte ayrılabilme umudunu. Bu sebeple de senden son bir ricam olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek exhales loudly and smiles.{/n} "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I... I don't even know what to say. Status and honour prevented me from admitting it before now, but you have awoken hope in me. Hope that I might actually leave this station together with the mistress. Which is why I am about to ask one last favour of you."
